interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 100pcs Premium Quality Hair Clips, 20 Glossy Colors Snap Hair Clips, 2 Inch Hair Barrettes with Perfect Grip, Durable Colorful Hair Clips with Smooth Edges for Kids, Girls, Women
Review Date: 2020/02/29
Store: Fagaci
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Fagaci', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Assorted', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Alloy Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 3.1 x 1 inches; 4.8 Ounces'}
Review Text: The colors are not as pictured. There is no bright orange or pale yellow, there are a lot of browns and many more muted pastel colors. The package arrived open with clips strewn about the box. That being said, they stay in my daughter's super fine hair better than the clips of this type we have used before. They have stayed in through a full school day and gymnastics class without falling out. They do have some rainbow colors, just not as many as we'd hoped for. We got 105 clips. So it the colors are important to you, know that they are on the more pastel side of what's pictured and that there is no true orange. They don't come in a giftable package. If staying in hair is what is important to you, these can't be beat.
Review Title: Muted colors, super staying power
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Type:A - Aluminum Free Deodorant for Men – Trailblazer- Unscented, Spice & Forest – Sweat Activated Technology, Natural Ingredients, Non-Toxic, Paraben Free, Non-Irritating, 2.8 Ounce (3 Pack)
type:A
{'Brand': 'Type:A', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Unit Count': '3.00 Count', 'Item Volume': '2.8 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '6.8 x 5 x 0.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
It doesn't work as well as old spice to prevent odor and sweat, but it does leave less residue on shirts. The spice scent smells like patchouli and mint, the evergreen scent smells strongly of pine trees, and unscented smells like baby powder. I can't say we are particularly fond of any of the scents. My husband is planning to use this set up, but we will probably not reorder it.
Not fond of the smells
Workman's Friend Ultimate Hand Care Bundle
WORKMAN'S FRIEND
{'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4.5 x 2.3 inches; 1.3 Pounds', 'UPC': '023857030709'}
We do a lot of house work, art, construction work, and gardening. We use a lot of soap. That orange goop with pumice in it is our normal heavy duty hand cleaner, this soap is equivalent to that soap without the orange scent. You definitely do need water for it to be effective even though the bottle claims you don't. The hand cream is a great heavy duty healing lotion, similar to eucerin. I haven't noticed an appreciable difference in the ease of cleanymy hands after using the barrier cream however.
Helps dirty hands
HIFAU Eyebrow Scissors 3 In 1 Kit, Eyebrow Razor and Comb Foldable Protection, Surgical Grade Stainless Steel Eyebrow Scissors and Tweezers, Mirror Polished, Easy to Carry, Travel Gift
HIFAU
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.1 x 2.4 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '634923554380'}
The razor cuts your skin but not your hair. The comb is cheap plastic that breaks if you look at it sideways. The tweezers aren't very good at gripping. The only good thing about this set are the little scissors. Those work well.
The scissors are the only things that work

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user maintains a focus on effective personal care products, specifically deodorants and heavy-duty hand care items, prioritizing performance in odor and sweat prevention, along with cleaning efficacy.

- **Scent Sensitivity**: The user has a strong aversion to strong or specific scents, leaning towards truly neutral or mild fragrances, with negative experiences with scents like patchouli, mint, and pine.

- **Texture, Residue, and Effectiveness**: The user avoids products that leave greasy or staining residues and values effectiveness and user experience, often comparing against well-known brands. They appreciate practical, sensory-sensitive solutions that perform well without offensive scents.

- **Natural Ingredients**: A commitment to natural, non-toxic products free from harmful chemicals is evident, reflecting a conscientious approach to personal care.

- **Grooming Tools Evaluation**: The user recently reviewed a grooming kit with mixed results, finding one item useful but expressing a critical perspective on performance, indicative of their overall standards for personal care products.

- **Reorder Willingness**: The user is careful about reordering and open to alternatives that meet their standards for quality, safety, and sensory preferences.

- **Recent Interaction**: The user has also shown an interest in hair accessories, highlighting a specific emphasis on functionality, such as staying power in hair clips, while also expressing dissatisfaction with product presentation and color accuracy.

Overall, the user demonstrates a thoughtful and critical approach to personal care and grooming, focusing on effectiveness, quality, and ingredient safety.
